All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AcidDrop
AcidDrop are creatures that can only move, hit then die.
Ant
Ants are creatures that figth ladybugs to protect aphids.
Aphid
Aphids are Creatures eated by ladybugs.
App
Main class that represent the App & call other Screens.
Assets
Centralized place to load and store assets.
Controller
Controller is the link between View & model.
Creature
Abstact class that represent Creature on the map.
EmojiSupport
Helper class to support emojis in libGDX.
EndGameMenu
Menu for the end of the game
EnvironmentMenuScreen
Group of actor able to display moving background.
EscapeGameMenu
Menu display when escape key is pressed.
Files
Tool class to manage files.
Fonts
Class that provide a way to load font.
GameScreen
The action game screen.
GameState
Class that containts all data about current game.
GameState.GameStateBuilder
Builder to use to get a GameState.
GreenAnt
Ants are creatures that figth ladybugs to protect aphids.
Hud
Game Hud that display player/game stats.
InputCore
React to user inputs.
KScreen
Screen class with fiew more funtion than the one provide by libGDX.
KTexture
Texture with high quality.
Ladybug
Ladybugs are Creature that eat aphids.
LadybugSideView
Ladybug that display in side view.
Level
Level of the game.
LevelButtonTable
Table containing button to select a level in main menu.
MapActor
Represent the map & overlay actor
MapItem
Abstact class that represent any thing on the map.
MapItemActor
Actor that represent a MapItem.
MapItemActor.StateView
Stores information needed by the view for a character state.
Math
Math tools class with usefull static functions.
MenuScreen
The main menu screen.
Musics
Tools class to manage music.
Native
Native provide custom function for OS dependent things.
Player
Player move a ladybug or an ant.
RedAnt
Ants are creatures that figth ladybugs to protect aphids.
Shapes
Tools to get Shapes that ShapeRenderer is not able to create.
TraillerImage
Display the trailler image.
